job_title: Human Resources Manager in Norwich, England
pros: Great opportunities to develop and progress

job_title: Energy and sustainability officer in Norwich, England
pros: Great place to come out of university and get your teeth into some project management experience if looking for that. People are trusting and let you growth and develop your role into how you want. Also great at providing support towards CPD activities.
cons: There are no major cons of working here

job_title: Housing Officer in East Dereham, England
pros: Company car and new developments were positive
cons: Appealing bullying by management, forced me to tell old lady that she couldn't keep her dog after living in one of their properties with it for years to test if I was up to the job. I chose to leave as this bullying continued.
Blame game, toxic managers, no care for their social tenants only care for high paying private tenants
